abstract: British Prime Min David Cameron says government will do all it can to help ailing steel industry after India's Tata Steel announces it will try to sell its British steel factories, but will not consider nationalization.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister David Cameron spoke after Tata Steel, an Indian company, announced on Wednesday that it would seek to sell its British steel factories.

headline.main: Cameron Rules Out Nationalization of Britain’s Struggling Steel Industry
headline.print_headline: Europe; Britain: Cameron Warns of Crisis Facing Steel Industry

snippet: Prime Minister David Cameron spoke after Tata Steel, an Indian company, announced on Wednesday that it would seek to sell its British steel factories.
